Reviews.Title: purchased of a new Samsung s4
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain Sam
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. it arrive early. love the 5 inch screen. It is very responsive. I had the galaxy note before and it was a little big, but the 5 inch is just perfect for me. It is a galaxy s4 i337.

Reviews.Title: Best gift I ever received
Reviews.Author: ritzyrizz
Reviews.Content: Nothing but praises for this phone. It's unlocked. It comes with those AT&T; and Samsung apps that you can't remove, but its ok :)I love this phone more than my previous iPhone 4s.

Reviews.Author: fernando de belen
Reviews.Content: phone worked ok...arrived on time...too much hype for this phone but didnt really wow me...its a fast phone but the features aren't all that great

Reviews.Title: Accelerometer
Reviews.Author: Scott Jude Landry
Reviews.Content: Accelerometer (screen rotation) did not work on arrival.  Good price but not happy that description did not include problem as well.

Reviews.Title: Nice to have a phone that does what it is supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: V. Sarco "Reviews influence my purchases"
Reviews.Content: Very lightweight.  Easy to use. Fast downloads. An enjoyable phone to own! I have not even learned much of what the phone can do but am already enjoying lots of apps on it.
